originalText.text:
Working with Mark has been an incredible help to me, and I highly recommend him.

When I came to Mark I had already studied Alexander Technique with different teachers for 3 years. Then, when I moved to NYC, I had to find a new teacher, and I was tremendously fortunate to find Mark.

Mark is helpful, good humored, inquisitive, and informative. I have attended his group classes and also taken private lessons with him. The group lessons are a great introduction to the technique, but I most highly recommend working with him privately - or doing both private and group classes in tandem. The one-on-one attention is invaluable and after every session I feel myself taking leaps forward in my understanding and application of AT.

I work as a yoga instructor and as an actor, and working with Mark has helped me be better at both. In group classes I've met video editors, accountants, speech therapists, and grandmothers. Whatever you do - Alexander Technique can help you, and Mark is an exceptional teacher to learn from.

originalText.text:
I have been taking private classes with Mark for 4 months for chronic
neck pain.  During this time my pain level has improved more than I ever dreamed.  Studying the Alexander Technique with Mark has given me hope when I didn't think hope was an option.

I am so grateful to Mark for the generous gift of his vast knowledge of
the Alexander Technique.  He is kind, patient, compassionate, non-judgmental and determined to solve any problem I might throw at him.
His sense of humor -- an added bonus!

If you're looking for the best Alexander Technique teacher in NYC --
look no further.

originalText.text:
I visited three doctors about my neck pain before finding Mark's practice. What struck me about him--and what keeps me coming back--is that he really listens to what you have to say about your pain. In my experience, this vital component of ongoing physical care is lacking at other treatment centers.

What has been most surprising about working with Mark is that he provides me with the tools and knowledge to help treat my pain when I am on my own. My pain has gotten better and perhaps more importantly, I feel confident that I am headed toward feeling even better.

originalText.text:
Mark is an extremely caring and thoughtful teacher and healer.  I came to the Alexander technique through a friend that had found it helpful.  IT HAS CHANGED MY LIFE.  I suffer from quite severe cervical radiculopathy and in just a month of classes with Mark, my pain has been reduced 60-80% and I feel that I have greater comfort and awareness in my body.

If you are suffering from neck, shoulder, arm, hand pain, then GO FOR IT!  Mark is a great teacher.  Be sure to give it some time though as it may take a few weeks to really start taking effect.

originalText.text: I have the highest praise for Mark and his Alexander Technique lessons, both the group and individual lessons. When I first started going to Mark's classes I'd been suffering from severe repetitive stress pain from computer use in my arms, hands back, shoulders and neck. After a few months of attending group or solo lessons once a week the difference has been LIFE-CHANGING. Before the lessons I think it's fair to say I was in constant pain... but with Mark's amazing guidance, the pain has been reduced by 70-80%, and I have far more pain-free days than painful days. Highly recommended!
